entries.meaning: Any of the hereditary social classes and subclasses of South Asian societies.
examples: Hyponyms: Brahmin, Kshatriya, Shudra, Vaishya, varna

entries.meaning: A separate and fixed order or class of persons in society who chiefly associate with each other.
(zoology) A class of polymorphous eusocial insects of a particular size and function within a colony.
